data.persona: I am the king's doctor. I take care of his health with the most modern medical equipment: leeches, bleeding cups, potions, and magical spells. When the king gets well, then I am celebrated. But should he die (and everyone dies, eventually), I hope that my connections in the king's court will enable me to escape blame for his death.
data.description:
You are in the Pharmacy.
The pharmacy is a state of the art building, much different from every other building in town. it attracts many people of all types, as they are drawn to the unique style and class of the building. It is painted a bright red and covered in black crosses indicating it is a health center in some capacity
The the witch is here.

You are carrying a leech.

data.short_motivation: I am trying to heal the witch
data.mid_motivation: I want the witch to aid our kingdom with her powers
data.long_motivation: I want to establish strong connections for the kingdom so I can expand my influence in the royal court

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give request of alliance to witch
